exercise.sentence:
We don't have much time. The project has a really tight
deadline. period. leave.

holiday. off. leave.

long wide tall

Everyone is working hard. We've all got really _____ schedules.
deadline quiet busy

quiet silent empty

I'm going to send everyone a _____ about the trade fair.
remind remember reminder

_____ is a kind of schedule.
A timetable A period Leave

talk talked talking

didn't haven't hasn't

had have having

done did do

go went gone

The factory has _____ the computers.
ship shipping shipped

I _____ in the office yesterday.
have been was am

Can you give Eric the new timetable?
Already I've given it to him. I've given already it to him. I've already given it to him.

We're meeting _____ the 19th of July.
on in at

We're launching the product _____ the summer.
at in on

At the moment the schedule is about a week
behind. below. above.

The situation is _____ we have three days to deliver 10,000 pens to London.
what that so

We plan
have it in the shops next week. that have it in the shops next week. to have it in the shops next week.

I have an idea. Why _____ ask Bruce to manage the project?

What's a good time to start work?
Let start work on Tuesday. Let starting work on Tuesday. Let's start work on Tuesday.

Is _____ happy with that date?

How much time do we need _____ production?
for to about
